Colonel Sir Edwin James Hayward, CBE, VD (24 December 1868 â€“ 14 November 1929) was a British soldier who was acting Commander of the Ceylon Defence Force. He was appointed on 6 March 1914.
He was appointed a Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE) in 1923 and knighted in 1927.
